participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Supportive and passionate about her interests, Emily enjoys sharing her love for books and spending time with her family.
participant_1.background: I have a wonderful family and they are always supportive of my music store and my love for Harry Potter. I was a stay-at-home mom when my kids were little. I am doing well in school, thank you for asking. I hate my parents, but I love my job. I hate to lose.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Determined and family-oriented, Michael is dedicated to making a positive change in his career while cherishing his loved ones.
participant_2.background: Others get to see a happy, healthy me on my days off. I start an internship in engineering later this year. I am passionate about fighting for what is right, even if it means putting my neck on the line. I used to be a lawyer. I have a wife and two kids.

content.text: Hey there, how are you today?
I'm good thanks, how about yourself?
I am doing well, thanks for asking!
Glad to hear that!
So, what do you do for a living?
I used to be a lawyer, but now I'm starting an internship in engineering.
Oh wow, that's a big change! What made you decide to make that change?
I wanted to do something that was more hands-on and creative.
That makes sense. What kind of engineering are you interested in?
I'm not sure yet, I'm still exploring my options.
Well, I'm sure you'll find something you're passionate about.
Thanks, I hope so!
So, what are your hobbies?
I like to spend time with my family and friends, I also enjoy reading, hiking, and fishing.
Those all sound like great hobbies! I love to read and hike as well.
Me too! What are some of your favorite books?
I love Harry Potter, the Lord of the Rings, and the Hunger Games series.
I love the Harry Potter series too! I've read them all multiple times.
Me too! I'm a huge fan.
I'm glad to hear that!
So, what do you like to do on your days off?
I like to relax and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a great way to spend your time.
It is! I love my family.
I can tell!
Thanks
